sentences.sContent: Police are investigating a series of violent rapes in the town.
sentences.sCn: 警察在调查镇上发生的一连串暴力强奸案。

sentences.sContent: He was arrested and charged with rape.
He always denied that he was guilty of rape.
sentences.sCn: 他一直否认自己犯有强奸罪。

sentences.sContent: the gang rape of a 17-year-old girl
He was convicted of attempted rape .
sentences.sCn: 他被判犯有强奸未遂罪。

synos.tran: 强奸，掠夺；[园艺]油菜；葡萄渣

trans.tranCn: 强奸，掠夺；[园艺] 油菜；葡萄渣
trans.tranOther: the crime of forcing someone to have sex, especially by using violence
to force someone to have sex, especially by using violence
